nodes.text: Tuttel was a Mustafarian male who lived on the planet Mustafar during the Imperial Era. Following the Battle of Endor and the death of the Sith Lord Darth Vader in 4 ABY, Tuttel and his friend Giggek entered Vader's abandoned fortress with the intent to destroy it, despite the warnings of Tuttel's uncle, Lellis. Inside the castle, the young boys were cornered by Vader's fanatic servant Vaneé, who locked Giggek away within the fortress. Giggek activated the explosives the duo had brought with them, damaging the castle and allowing Tuttel to escape with his life.
